org.csstudio.platform.security
Class SecurityEvent

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.security.SecurityEvent

public abstract class SecurityEvent
extends java.lang.Object

This is a superclass for all events that need a message with a timestamp.

Author:
Kai Meyer & Torsten Witte & Alexander Will & Sven Wende
